ind:family_test.comment: installed operating system is part of the Unix family

linux:rpminfo_test.comment: Ensure package name equals 'nginx' is installed

shell:shellcommand_test.comment: Ensure HTTP WebDAV module is not installed

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure any file(s) named nginx.conf in /etc/nginx exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)autoindex\s+off;[a-z\s]*$
Ensure any file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/conf.d exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)autoindex\s+off;[a-z\s]*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/shadow exists and matches pattern ^nginx:(!:|!!:).*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/shadow exists and does not match pattern ^nginx:
Ensure at least one file named /etc/passwd exists and matches pattern ^.*nginx\:(\/sbin\/nologin|\/bin\/false)$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/passwd exists and does not match pattern ^nginx\:.*$

unix:file_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions ----w--w-
Ensure any file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions ----w--w-
Ensure any file(s) named ^(?i)\S+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions --x-wxrwx
Ensure at least one file named /var/run/nginx.pid exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure any files named ^(?i)\S+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx exists and matches pattern ^\s*keepalive_timeout\s+(10|[1-9])\;.*$
Ensure any files named ^(?i)\S+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/conf.d exists and matches pattern ^\s*keepalive_timeout\s+(10|[1-9])\;.*$
Ensure any file(s) named ^(?i)\S+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx exists and matches pattern ^\s*send_timeout\s+(10|[1-9])\;.*$
Ensure any files named ^(?i)\S+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx/conf.d exists and matches pattern ^\s*send_timeout\s+(10|[1-9])\;.*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*server_tokens.*off;$
Ensure at least one file named /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html exists and does not match pattern ((?i)(NGINX))
Ensure at least one file named grep -i nginx /usr/share/nginx/html/50x.html exists and does not match pattern ((?i)(NGINX))
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*proxy_hide_header\s+(?i)x-powered-by;[a-z\s]*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*proxy_hide_header\s+(?i)server;[a-z\s]*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx exists and does not match pattern ^\s*(?i)access_log\s*off;[a-z\s]*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/conf.d exists and does not match pattern ^\s*(?i)access_log\s*off;[a-z\s]*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)error_log\s+\S+\s+info;[a-z\s]*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/logrotate.d/nginx exists and matches pattern ^\s*weekly\s*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/logrotate.d/nginx exists and matches pattern ^\s*rotate\s+13\s*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*ssl_certificate_key\s+\/\S+;[a-z\s]*$

unix:file_test.comment: Ensure any file(s) named ^\S+\.key$ in /etc/nginx exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions -wxrwxrwx

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and does not match pattern \s*(?i)ssl_protocols\s+(SSLv2(\s+|;)|SSLv3(\s+|;)|TLSv1(\s+|;)|TLSv1\.1(\s+|;)).*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and does not match pattern ^\s*(?i)proxy_ssl_protocols\s+(SSLv2(\s+|;)|SSLv3(\s+|;)|TLSv1(\s+|;)|TLSv1\.1(\s+|;)).*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/conf.d exists and does not match pattern ^\s*(?i)ssl_protocols\s+(SSLv2(\s+|;)|SSLv3(\s+|;)|TLSv1(\s+|;)|TLSv1\.1(\s+|;)).*$

Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)(ssl_protocols\s+|proxy_ssl_protocols\s+).*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/conf.d exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)(ssl_protocols\s+|proxy_ssl_protocols\s+).*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)ssl_stapling\s+on;.*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)ssl_stapling_verify\s+on;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/conf.d exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)ssl_stapling\s+on;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/conf.d exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)ssl_stapling_verify\s+on;.*$

Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)add_header\s+strict-transport-security\s+"max-age=(1576[89]\d{3}|157[7-9]\d{4}|15[89]\d{5}|1[6-9]\d{6}|[2-9]\d{7}|[1-9]\d{8,});.*$

Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)add_header\s+strict-transport-security\s+"max-age=(1576[89]\d{3}|157[7-9]\d{4}|15[89]\d{5}|1[6-9]\d{6}|[2-9]\d{7}|[1-9]\d{8,});.*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*pin-sha256="\S+";.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/conf.d exists and matches pattern ^\s*pin-sha256="\S+";.*$
Ensure at least one file named \etc\nginx\nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)proxy_ssl_certificate\s+\/\S+;.*$
Ensure at least one file named \etc\nginx\nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)proxy_ssl_certificate_key\s+\/\S+;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/conf.d exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)proxy_ssl_certificate\s+\/\S+;.*$

Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/conf.d exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)proxy_ssl_verify\s+on;.*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)ssl_session_tickets\s+off;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/conf.d exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)ssl_session_tickets\s+off;.*$
Ensure at least one file named \etc\nginx\nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)listen\s+\d{1,5}\s+ssl\s+http2;.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in \etc\nginx\conf.d exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)listen\s+\d{1,5}\s+ssl\s+http2;.*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)client_body_timeout\s+(10|[1-9]);.*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern \s*(?i)client_header_timeout\s+(10|[1-9]);.*$

Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx/conf.d exists and matches pattern \s*(?i)client_header_timeout\s+(10|[1-9]);.*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)client_max_body_size\s+(100|[1-9][0-9]|[1-9])k\b.*$

Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx/nginx.conf exists and matches pattern ^\s*(?i)large_client_header_buffers\s+\d{1,3}\s+\d{1,3}\S\b.*$

shell:shellcommand_state.comment: Ensure HTTP WebDAV module is not installed

unix:file_state.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/nginx exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions ----w--w-
Ensure any file(s) named ^.*$ in /etc/nginx exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions ----w--w-
Ensure any file(s) named ^(?i)\S+\.conf$ in /etc/nginx exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions --x-wxrwx
Ensure at least one file named /var/run/nginx.pid exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure any file(s) named ^\S+\.key$ in /etc/nginx exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions -wxrwxrwx
